## how to deploy Shiny on Magellan

> https://kb-am1.sanofi.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=35243894

> https://kb-am1.sanofi.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=35235361




```{bash}

# 把对应的文件夹传到/cloud-home/ShinyApps/4.3.3下即可


chmod +x ~/ShinyApps/<R_VERSION>/<APP_VERSION>


chown -R 1000:1000 ~/ShinyApps/<R_VERSION>/<APP_VERSION>



# https://magellan-shiny.sanofi.com/<USER_ID>/<R_VERSION>/<APP_NAME>
```
